dataTemplate.name: XXSCCAPTSR
dataTemplate.description: OD SC CAP Tracking Log Summary Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: select OD_SC_CAP_ASSIGNMENT CAP_ASSIGNMENT ,COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_ASSIGNMENT) TOTAL_CAP_ASSIGNMENT ,COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_SENT_D) TOTAL_CAP_SENT_D ,COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_RECD_D) TOTAL_CAP_RECD_D ,COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_RESP_D) TOTAL_CAP_RESP_D ,COUNT(OD_SC_STRAUDT_GSO_APR_D) TOTAL_GSO_APR_D ,COUNT(OD_SC_SRTAUDT_US_APR_D) TOTAL_US_APR_D ,(COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_ASSIGNMENT) )+COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_SENT_D) + COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_RECD_D) + COUNT(OD_SC_CAP_RESP_D) + COUNT(OD_SC_STRAUDT_GSO_APR_D) +COUNT(OD_SC_SRTAUDT_US_APR_D) TOTAL_ROWS FROM (SELECT * FROM q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODUS')) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_eu_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODEU')) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_mx_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODMX')) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_asia_vendor_master_v WHERE (:P_PROFILE_VALUE in ('ODGLB','ODASIA')) ) where OD_SC_CAP_ASSIGNMENT is not null group by OD_SC_CAP_ASSIGNMENT
